publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2561 Mr Tom McCabe:The Draft Non-Domestic Rating (Valuation of Utilities) ( Scotland) Revocation Order 2005—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Non-Domestic Rating (Valuation of Utilities) ( Scotland) Revocation Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott*

S2M-2561 Mr Tom McCabe:The Draft Non-Domestic Rating (Valuation of Utilities) ( Scotland) Revocation Order 2005—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that the draft Non-Domestic Rating (Valuation of Utilities) ( Scotland) Revocation Order 2005 be approved. Supported by: Tavish Scott
